ing: 1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese, or more to taste
2 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste
des: "This is a nice twist on the traditional slaw and is a great accompaniment to any summer meal! This can easily be doubled to take to a potluck."
ins: Mix mayonnaise, blue cheese, sugar, olive oil, mustard, vinegar, red pepper flakes, onion powder, and celery salt together in a large bowl. Add cabbage, carrots, broccoli, and raisins; stir to coat. Chill in refrigerator at least 2 hours before serving.
